en.today_drink_count: Number of times to drink water today
en.week_drink_count: Drinking water frequency in the past seven days
en.do_not_disturb_tip: After opening, there is no water outlet within the corresponding time
en.work_record_title_2: Drinking water duration in the past 7 days
en.child_lock_tip: After opening the child lock, the buttons on the device are not available
en.do_not_disturb_sub_title: {0}~{1} is the device's undisturbed time period. If you need the device to work, please turn off the undisturbed mode.
en.replace_way_desc: After removing the water basin, it can be replaced. It is recommended to clean the water bucket and all parts at the same time as replacing the filter element. After replacement, dry the inner and outer sides of the water basin and bucket, and use them after installation.
en.reset_repeat_tip_sub: The replacement cycle will restart, please confirm that you have completed the filter replacement.
en.reset_repeat_tip_sub_1: The replacement cycle will restart, please confirm that you have completed the equipment cleaning.
en.device_wash_desc: Normally, it is recommended to clean once a week. In case of temperature rise or poor water quality, the cleaning cycle can be shortened. (Without a filter element, water is prone to deterioration and is not recommended for use in this situation)
en.wash_way_desc_1: Step 1: Take out the water basin, filter element, and partition layer in sequence;
en.wash_way_desc_2: Step 2: Remove the adhered hair and impurities during the cleaning process;
en.wash_way_desc_3: Step 3: Dry the inner and outer sides of the water basin, bucket, and partition layer, and air the water pump and filter element;
en.wash_way_desc_4: Step 4: Assemble each part into a complete machine
en.battery_power_disabled: Battery powered, continuous water discharge not available
en.sleep_time_error: Start time and end time cannot be the same

zh.do_not_disturb_tip: 开启后，对应时间内不出水
zh.child_lock_tip: 打开童锁后，设备上的按键不可用
zh.do_not_disturb_sub_title: {0} ~ {1} 为设备免打扰时间段，如需设备工作，请关闭免打扰模式。
zh.replace_way_desc: 取下水盆之后，即可更换。建议更换滤芯的同时，对水桶和各部分进行一次清洁，更换后将水盆、水桶内外侧擦干，安装后使用。
zh.reset_repeat_tip_sub: 更换周期将重新开始计时，请确认您已完成滤芯更换。
zh.reset_repeat_tip_sub_1: 更换周期将重新开始计时，请确认您已完成设备清洗。
zh.device_wash_desc: 通常情况下，建议一周清洗一次。在温度上升或水质不好情况下，可以缩短清洗周期。（无滤芯情况下，水容易变质，不建议在该情况下使用）
zh.wash_way_desc_1: 步骤1：依次将水盆、滤芯、隔层分别拿出；
zh.wash_way_desc_2: 步骤2：在清洗过程中将粘附的毛发、杂质清除；
zh.wash_way_desc_3: 步骤3：将水盆、水桶内外侧、隔层擦干，水泵、滤芯晾；
zh.wash_way_desc_4: 步骤4：将各部分组装成整机
zh.battery_power_disabled: 电池供电中，持续出水不可用
zh.sleep_time_error: 开始时间与结束时间不能相同
